Sam Hopkins (amụrụ n'afọ 1979 na Rome) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na Kenya. A na-eji ụzọ ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ mara ọrụ ya, dị ka imekọ ihe ọnụ, itinye aka na mmepụta

Enwere ike ịkọwa ọrụ nka Hopkins, nke na-adabere na ọrụ ma na-emetụta ndị mmadụ dị ka ihe na ihe onwunwe nke ọrụ ahụ, dị ka Social Practice. N'afọ 2014, Foreign Policy Magazine kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị 100 Global Thinkers.
A zụlitere Hopkins na Britain na Kenya
O nwere nzere na Mahadum Edinburgh (MA), Mahadum Oxford Brookes (MA) na Mahadim nke Arts London (PhD)
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye nyocha nka na Academy of Media Arts na Cologne.
